text: God has made the Kaaba, the Sacred House, an establishment for human beings, and (also) the sacred month and the offerings and the victims with garlands, that is so, that you may know that God knows whatever is in the skies and whatever is in the earth and that God is the Knower of everything (Omniscient). nd the offerings and the victims with garlands, that is so, that you may know that God knows whatever is in the skies and whatever is in the earth and that God is the Knower of everything (Omniscient)
